name: Boots of the Free Gales
entries: Your movement speed increases by 10 feet and you gain a fly speed equal to your speed.

Stride of the Free. You can use a bonus action on your turn to disengage. When you are suffering from the Grapple, Restrained, or Prone condition you can spend 10 feet of movement to end the condition. When you do this each creature of your choice within 10 feet of you must make a DC 15 Str save or be knocked back 5 feet.

Curse. If you do not move your full movement on your turn you suffer {@dice 4d4} slashing damage as the agitated wind attacks you. Additionally, you feel uncomfortable in confined places, and you suffer disadvantage on Wisdom ability checks and saving throws while indoors or underground.

Shackles of Carreshal. This item contains the spirit of a destructive elemental tempest known as Elitanith. While this cloak is not being worn by someone the enchantment magic holding Elitanith at bay begins to wane. After {@dice 1d6+2} days the boots vanish and transform into a portal into the Elemental Plane of Air. After {@dice 2d4+2} days the magic fails entirely and Elitanith is freed.
